author: Nicola Agius
title: Emily Ratajkowski accidentally flashes her nude knickers in embarrassing fashion fail at Golden Globes 2017

organizations.name: warner bros golden globes after party

text:
Emily Ratajkowski accidentally flashes her nude knickers in embarrassing fashion fail at Golden Globes 2017 The slip up left very little to the imagination Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch: The worst dressed celebrities on the Golden Globes red carpet Share this video Get celebs   
Emily Ratajkowski suffered an embarrassing fashion fail at the Golden Globes 2017 . 
As the model showed off her daring gown by Reem Acra, she accidentally managed to flash her nude knickers to an army of photographers. 
She was playfully on the red carpet at the time when she inadvertently lifted the dress up higher than she realised, putting her underwear on show for the whole world to see. 
However, we doubt she will be left too red-faced by the mishap as the star is no stranger to showing off her figure in front of the camera. InStyle and Warner Bros Golden Globes After Party, Arrivals, Los Angeles, USA - 08 Jan 2017 (Photo: Rex) 
In addition to putting her knickers on display, Emily also used the Golden Globes to debut her striking new look. 
Ahead of the lavish bash, the star decided to go for the chop and had her trademark glossy brunette locks cut shorter. 
2017 Golden Globes: All of the red carpet dresses from the annual awards ceremony 
The model's stylist Christian Wood had initially planning to pin back her shoulder-length hair but in the end opted for a mini chop. As the model showed off her daring gown by Reem Acra, she accidentally managed to flash her nude knickers to an army of photographers (Photo: Rex) 
"I wasn't planning on cutting the hair, but Emily wanted to do something different and daring," Christian Wood told Elle. "I cut some of her actual hair on the top, and some on the sides to help blend into the faux bob. Read More Classmates of a-listers reveal what they were REALLY like at school - from Patrick Swayze to Ariana Grande 
"After the Golden Globes, I plan on cutting some side swept bangs in to help blend it into her real hair." 
Last week, an anonymous Reddit poster, claiming to be a former classmate of Emily's, took to the site to reveal what she was like back in college before she was famous. The star is no stranger to showing off her figure in front of the camera (Photo: Barcroft Media) 
They claimed: "We shared a bunk bed and dorm room. She was nice, a great artist, kind of valley girl-ish, but pretty down to earth actually, very pretty girl. 
"She actually had kind of a tough time making friends within the program, like she wasn't interested in doing so." 
We doubt Emily has a "tough time making friends" now...
